entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
